titles.title: True Price Act
True Price Act
A bill to require group health plans and health insurance issuers offering health insurance coverage to disclose cost information to enrollees in such plans or coverage.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
True Price Act
This bill requires health insurers to disclose to enrollees the negotiated rate paid by the plan and the cost-sharing amount charged to enrollees for health care services covered by the plan.
